$f_x(x_t,\lambda)=\lambda e^{-\lambda x_t}$

1) $LLK(\lambda,x)=\sum_{t=1}^T[\log \lambda - \lambda x_t ] = T\lambda-\log \lambda \sum_{t=1}^Tx_t$

```{r}


dLambda <- 5
vX <- rexp(10000, dLambda)

nLLK <- function(dLambda, vX) {
  dnLLK <- -sum(dexp(vX, dLambda, log = TRUE))
  return(dnLLK)
}

vLambda <- seq(1, 10, by = 0.1)

vnLLK <- sapply(vLambda, nLLK, vX = vX)

plot(vLambda, vnLLK, type = "l")
```
